sentences.sContent: It’s a miracle you weren’t killed!
By some miracle, we managed to catch the plane.
sentences.sCn: 我们奇迹般地赶上了飞机。

synos.tran: 奇迹，奇迹般的人或物；惊人的事例

phrases.pCn: 奇妙地；好得不可思议；好到惊人程度；完全地

remMethod.val: mir(惊奇) + acle(表物) → 奇迹； 奇事

words.tran: 奇迹般地；神奇地；非凡地；出乎意料地

trans.tranOther: something very lucky or very good that happens which you did not expect to happen or did not think was possible
